verses.verse: בִּשְׁנַת֙ <S%H8141><s%> year שְׁתֵּ֣ים <S%H8147><s%> both עֶשְׂרֵ֔ה <S%H6240><s%> ten לְאָחָ֖ז <S%H271><s%> of Ahaz מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> king יְהוּדָ֑ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah מָ֠לַךְ <S%H4427><s%> to reign הוֹשֵׁ֨עַ <S%H1954><s%> began Hoshea בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son אֵלָ֧ה <S%H425><s%> of Elah בְשֹׁמְר֛וֹן <S%H8111><s%> in Samaria עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> over Israel תֵּ֥שַׁע <S%H8672><s%> nine שָׁנִֽים׃ <S%H8141><s%> years

וַיַּ֥עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> And he did הָרַ֖ע <S%H7451><s%> [that which was] evil בְּעֵינֵ֣י <S%H5869><s%> in the sight יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD רַ֗ק <S%H7535><s%> but לֹ֚א <S%H3808><s%> not כְּמַלְכֵ֣י <S%H4428><s%> but not as the kings יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> who הָי֖וּ <S%H1961><s%> become לְפָנָֽיו׃ <S%H6440><s%> that were before

עָלָ֣יו <S%H5921><s%> against עָלָ֔ה <S%H5927><s%> Against him came up שַׁלְמַנְאֶ֖סֶר <S%H8022><s%> Shalmaneser מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> king אַשּׁ֑וּר <S%H804><s%> of Assyria וַֽיְהִי־ <S%H1961><s%> became ל֤וֹ הוֹשֵׁ֙עַ֙ <S%H1954><s%> and Hoshea עֶ֔בֶד <S%H5650><s%> became his servant וַיָּ֥שֶׁב <S%H7725><s%> and gave ל֖וֹ מִנְחָֽה׃ <S%H4503><s%> him presents

וַיִּמְצָא֩ <S%H4672><s%> found מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> And the king אַשּׁ֨וּר <S%H804><s%> of Assyria בְּהוֹשֵׁ֜עַ <S%H1954><s%> in Hoshea קֶ֗שֶׁר <S%H7195><s%> conspiracy אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> who שָׁלַ֤ח <S%H7971><s%> for he had sent מַלְאָכִים֙ <S%H4397><s%> messengers אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to ס֣וֹא <S%H5471><s%> to So מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> king מִצְרַ֔יִם <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> no הֶעֱלָ֥ה <S%H5927><s%> and brought מִנְחָ֛ה <S%H4503><s%> no present לְמֶ֥לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> to the king אַשּׁ֖וּר <S%H804><s%> of Assyria כְּשָׁנָ֣ה <S%H8141><s%> as [he had done] year בְשָׁנָ֑ה <S%H8141><s%> by year וַֽיַּעַצְרֵ֙הוּ֙ <S%H6113><s%> shut him up מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> therefore the king אַשּׁ֔וּר <S%H804><s%> of Assyria וַיַּאַסְרֵ֖הוּ <S%H631><s%> and bound בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> court כֶּֽלֶא׃ <S%H3608><s%> prison

וַיַּ֥עַל <S%H5927><s%> came up מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> Then the king אַשּׁ֖וּר <S%H804><s%> of Assyria בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> the whole הָאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> throughout all the land וַיַּ֙עַל֙ <S%H5927><s%> and went up שֹׁמְר֔וֹן <S%H8111><s%> to Samaria וַיָּ֥צַר <S%H6696><s%> and besieged עָלֶ֖יהָ <S%H5921><s%> and שָׁלֹ֥שׁ <S%H7969><s%> it three שָׁנִֽים׃ <S%H8141><s%> years

בִּשְׁנַ֨ת <S%H8141><s%> year הַתְּשִׁיעִ֜ית <S%H8671><s%> In the ninth לְהוֹשֵׁ֗עַ <S%H1954><s%> of Hoshea לָכַ֤ד <S%H3920><s%> took מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> the king אַשּׁוּר֙ <S%H804><s%> of Assyria אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שֹׁ֣מְר֔וֹן <S%H8111><s%> Samaria וַיֶּ֥גֶל <S%H1540><s%> away אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> Israel אַשּׁ֑וּרָה <S%H804><s%> into Assyria וַיֹּ֨שֶׁב <S%H3427><s%> and placed אֹתָ֜ם <S%H853><s%> בַּחְלַ֧ח <S%H2477><s%> them in Halah וּבְחָב֛וֹר <S%H2249><s%> and in Habor נְהַ֥ר <S%H5104><s%> [by] the river גּוֹזָ֖ן <S%H1470><s%> of Gozan וְעָרֵ֥י <S%H5892><s%> and in the cities מָדָֽי׃ <S%H4074><s%> of the Medes פ

וַיְהִ֗י <S%H1961><s%> now came כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> because חָטְא֤וּ <S%H2398><s%> had sinned בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> For [so] it was that the children יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel לַיהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> against the LORD אֱלֹהֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H430><s%> their God הַמַּעֲלֶ֤ה <S%H5927><s%> which had brought them up אֹתָם֙ <S%H853><s%> מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> out of the land מִצְרַ֔יִם <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt מִתַּ֕חַת <S%H8478><s%> under יַ֖ד <S%H3027><s%> from under the hand פַּרְעֹ֣ה <S%H6547><s%> of Pharaoh מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> king מִצְרָ֑יִם <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt וַיִּֽירְא֖וּ <S%H3372><s%> and had feared אֱלֹהִ֥ים <S%H430><s%> gods אֲחֵרִֽים׃ <S%H312><s%> other

וַיֵּֽלְכוּ֙ <S%H1980><s%> and walked בְּחֻקּ֣וֹת <S%H2708><s%> in the statutes הַגּוֹיִ֔ם <S%H1471><s%> of the heathen אֲשֶׁר֙ <S%H834><s%> whom הוֹרִ֣ישׁ <S%H3423><s%> cast out יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> whom the LORD מִפְּנֵ֖י <S%H6440><s%> from before בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וּמַלְכֵ֥י <S%H4428><s%> and of the kings יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which עָשֽׂוּ׃ <S%H6213><s%> which they had made

וַיְחַפְּא֣וּ <S%H2644><s%> did secretly בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> And the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel דְּבָרִים֙ <S%H1697><s%> [those] things אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> not כֵ֔ן <S%H3651><s%> after that עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> against יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> that [were] not right against the LORD אֱלֹהֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H430><s%> their God וַיִּבְנ֨וּ <S%H1129><s%> and they built לָהֶ֤ם בָּמוֹת֙ <S%H1116><s%> them high places בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all עָ֣רֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H5892><s%> in all their cities מִמִּגְדַּ֥ל <S%H4026><s%> from the tower נוֹצְרִ֖ים <S%H5341><s%> of the watchmen עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against עִ֥יר <S%H5892><s%> city מִבְצָֽר׃ <S%H4013><s%> to the fenced

וַיַּצִּ֧בוּ <S%H5324><s%> And they set them up לָהֶ֛ם מַצֵּב֖וֹת <S%H4676><s%> images וַאֲשֵׁרִ֑ים <S%H842><s%> and groves עַ֚ל <S%H5921><s%> on כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> every גִּבְעָ֣ה <S%H1389><s%> hill גְבֹהָ֔ה <S%H1364><s%> in every high וְתַ֖חַת <S%H8478><s%> and under כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> every עֵ֥ץ <S%H6086><s%> tree רַעֲנָֽן׃ <S%H7488><s%> and under every green

וַיְקַטְּרוּ־ <S%H6999><s%> And there they burnt incense שָׁם֙ <S%H8033><s%> and there בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all בָּמ֔וֹת <S%H1116><s%> in all the high places כַּגּוֹיִ֕ם <S%H1471><s%> as [did] the heathen אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which הֶגְלָ֥ה <S%H1540><s%> carried away יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> whom the LORD מִפְּנֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H6440><s%> before וַֽיַּעֲשׂוּ֙ <S%H6213><s%> them and wrought דְּבָרִ֣ים <S%H1697><s%> things רָעִ֔ים <S%H7451><s%> wicked לְהַכְעִ֖יס <S%H3707><s%> to anger אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> to provoke the LORD

וַיַּֽעַבְד֖וּ <S%H5647><s%> For they served הַגִּלֻּלִ֑ים <S%H1544><s%> idols אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> which אָמַ֤ר <S%H559><s%> had said יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> whereof the LORD לָהֶ֔ם לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> shall not תַעֲשׂ֖וּ <S%H6213><s%> unto them Ye shall not do אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַדָּבָ֥ר <S%H1697><s%> this thing הַזֶּֽה׃ <S%H2088><s%> this

וַיָּ֣עַד <S%H5749><s%> testified יְהוָ֡ה <S%H3068><s%> Yet the LORD בְּיִשְׂרָאֵ֣ל <S%H3478><s%> against Israel וּבִיהוּדָ֡ה <S%H3063><s%> and against Judah בְּיַד֩ <S%H3027><s%> by כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all [נְבִיאֹו כ] (נְבִיאֵ֨י <S%H5030><s%> his prophets ק) כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> every חֹזֶ֜ה <S%H2374><s%> [and by] all the seers לֵאמֹ֗ר <S%H559><s%> saying שֻׁ֝֩בוּ <S%H7725><s%> Turn מִדַּרְכֵיכֶ֤ם <S%H1870><s%> ways הָֽרָעִים֙ <S%H7451><s%> ye from your evil וְשִׁמְרוּ֙ <S%H8104><s%> and keep מִצְוֹתַ֣י <S%H4687><s%> my commandments חֻקּוֹתַ֔י <S%H2708><s%> [and] my statutes כְּכָ֨ל־ <S%H3605><s%> to all הַתּוֹרָ֔ה <S%H8451><s%> according to all the law אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which צִוִּ֖יתִי <S%H6680><s%> which I commanded אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֲבֹֽתֵיכֶ֑ם <S%H1><s%> your fathers וַֽאֲשֶׁר֙ <S%H834><s%> and which שָׁלַ֣חְתִּי <S%H7971><s%> and which I sent אֲלֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H413><s%> to you בְּיַ֖ד <S%H3027><s%> to you by עֲבָדַ֥י <S%H5650><s%> my servants הַנְּבִיאִֽים׃ <S%H5030><s%> all the prophets

וְלֹ֖א <S%H3808><s%> did not שָׁמֵ֑עוּ <S%H8085><s%> Notwithstanding they would not hear וַיַּקְשׁ֤וּ <S%H7185><s%> but hardened אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עָרְפָּם֙ <S%H6203><s%> their necks כְּעֹ֣רֶף <S%H6203><s%> like to the neck אֲבוֹתָ֔ם <S%H1><s%> of their fathers אֲשֶׁר֙ <S%H834><s%> who לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> did not הֶאֱמִ֔ינוּ <S%H539><s%> that did not believe בַּֽיהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> in the LORD אֱלֹהֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H430><s%> their God

וַיִּמְאֲס֣וּ <S%H3988><s%> And they rejected אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> חֻקָּ֗יו <S%H2706><s%> his statutes וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּרִיתוֹ֙ <S%H1285><s%> and his covenant אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which כָּרַ֣ת <S%H3772><s%> that he made אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> with אֲבוֹתָ֔ם <S%H1><s%> with their fathers וְאֵת֙ <S%H853><s%> עֵֽדְוֹתָ֔יו <S%H5715><s%> and his testimonies אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which הֵעִ֖יד <S%H5749><s%> which he testified בָּ֑ם וַיֵּ֨לְכוּ֜ <S%H1980><s%> along אַחֲרֵ֤י <S%H310><s%> and went after הַהֶ֙בֶל֙ <S%H1892><s%> vanity וַיֶּהְבָּ֔לוּ <S%H1891><s%> and became vain וְאַחֲרֵ֤י <S%H310><s%> and after הַגּוֹיִם֙ <S%H1471><s%> the heathen אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which סְבִֽיבֹתָ֔ם <S%H5439><s%> that [were] round about אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> which צִוָּ֤ה <S%H6680><s%> had charged יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> them [concerning] whom the LORD אֹתָ֔ם <S%H853><s%> לְבִלְתִּ֖י <S%H1115><s%> not עֲשׂ֥וֹת <S%H6213><s%> them that they should not do כָּהֶֽם׃

וַיַּעַזְב֗וּ <S%H5800><s%> And they left אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all מִצְוֹת֙ <S%H4687><s%> all the commandments יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֱלֹהֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H430><s%> their God וַיַּעֲשׂ֥וּ <S%H6213><s%> and made לָהֶ֛ם מַסֵּכָ֖ה <S%H4541><s%> them molten images [שְׁנֵים כ] (שְׁנֵ֣י <S%H8147><s%> both ק) עֲגָלִ֑ים <S%H5695><s%> calves וַיַּעֲשׂ֣וּ <S%H6213><s%> and made אֲשֵׁירָ֗ה <S%H842><s%> a grove וַיִּֽשְׁתַּחֲווּ֙ <S%H7812><s%> and worshipped לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all צְבָ֣א <S%H6635><s%> all the host הַשָּׁמַ֔יִם <S%H8064><s%> of heaven וַיַּעַבְד֖וּ <S%H5647><s%> and served אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַבָּֽעַל׃ <S%H1168><s%> Baal

וַֽ֠יַּעֲבִירוּ <S%H5674><s%> to pass אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּנֵיהֶ֤ם <S%H1121><s%> And they caused their sons וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּנֽוֹתֵיהֶם֙ <S%H1323><s%> and their daughters בָּאֵ֔שׁ <S%H784><s%> through the fire וַיִּקְסְמ֥וּ <S%H7080><s%> and used קְסָמִ֖ים <S%H7081><s%> divination וַיְנַחֵ֑שׁוּ <S%H5172><s%> and enchantments וַיִּֽתְמַכְּר֗וּ <S%H4376><s%> and sold לַעֲשׂ֥וֹת <S%H6213><s%> themselves to do הָרַ֛ע <S%H7451><s%> evil בְּעֵינֵ֥י <S%H5869><s%> in the sight יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD לְהַכְעִיסֽוֹ׃ <S%H3707><s%> to provoke him to anger

וַיִּתְאַנַּ֨ף <S%H599><s%> angry יְהוָ֤ה <S%H3068><s%> Therefore the LORD מְאֹד֙ <S%H3966><s%> was very בְּיִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> with Israel וַיְסִרֵ֖ם <S%H5493><s%> and removed מֵעַ֣ל <S%H5921><s%> from פָּנָ֑יו <S%H6440><s%> them out of his sight לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> none נִשְׁאַ֔ר <S%H7604><s%> there was none left רַ֛ק <S%H7535><s%> but שֵׁ֥בֶט <S%H7626><s%> but the tribe יְהוּדָ֖ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah לְבַדּֽוֹ׃ <S%H905><s%> alone

גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> Also יְהוּדָ֕ה <S%H3063><s%> Also Judah לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> did not שָׁמַ֔ר <S%H8104><s%> kept אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מִצְוֹ֖ת <S%H4687><s%> not the commandments יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֱלֹהֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H430><s%> their God וַיֵּ֣לְכ֔וּ <S%H1980><s%> walked בְּחֻקּ֥וֹת <S%H2708><s%> in the statutes יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which עָשֽׂוּ׃ <S%H6213><s%> which they made
